divs: Sighting Detailsthis started about two weeks ago the first I sar the object it was just dancing around the sky. The second time there were two they would dance in different directions and occasionally come close together ans thes shoot off in different directions. The other one seemed to stay a good distance away but did move around a good while. I need to know if this is real or if I am completely loosing it. I need help to decide. Thanks.
